description: The Premium Polystyrene Beans from the branded collection named "heimdekor®", German translation “Home Decor”. A Quality Product that is ergonomically designed and aesthetically appealing with a perfect heimdekor bean bag refill are the most premium refills across the market. Fill your bean bag with the good quality beans for maximum comfort and ensure long life. Has your bean bag lost its fluffiness and the comfort it used to provide, then here's your chance to grab this pack of fillers from heimdekor Bean, These beans are the optimum beans for your bean bag giving maximum comfort. These are not just dense, but they are also extremely durable and resilient. Included heimdekor beans, Keep away from pointed and burning objects. A Must have for your Living / Bed Room. Get Comfortable, Get HEIMDEKOR, India's Bean Bag Manufacturer. Your Satisfaction and your Neighbor’s envy Guaranteed!! These beautiful beans can transform every home immaculately, an innovation rarely seen, only from the house of “The Home Decor Store (India)”.
